tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Great teacher. GO TO CLASS. He does alot in a little time. Little on the weird side but in a good way. Gives the opportunity to make up partial points on tests. Homework is alot, but real easy. Anything you don\'t understand he strives to help. Would take again. NOTE: He does not use a physical textbook. He uses mymathlab.
